cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.text: This website uses cookies to improve your experience. We'll assume you're ok with this, but you can opt-out if you wish.
cookies.link: Read more about our cookie policy
cookies.necessaryText: These cookies are crucial for the website to function and cannot be disabled.
cookies.analyticsText: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the website by collecting information anonymously.
